synopsis.text: Many years after Naota's adventure with the energetic and eccentric Haruko, she mysteriously returns to Earth once more. Meanwhile, the intergalactic conflict between Medical Mechanica and Fraternity rages on. Enter Hidomi, a disillusioned teenager who believes her mundane life will remain uneventful, until the vivacious Haruko appears as a teacher at her school. Soon after, Medical Mechanica attacks Hidomi's town, and she discovers a hidden power within herself that could save everyone. This power can only be unlocked by Haruko, who still wields her signature Rickenbacker guitar after all these years. As Haruko and Hidomi join forces, intriguing questions remain. Why has Haruko returned to Earth? What is the significance of the humanoid robot Canti, who has disappeared since Naota's childhood adventure? And what revelations will Hidomi discover about her true identity as she is drawn into Haruko's exhilarating and dangerous world once again? Bursting with offbeat humor and spectacular visuals, this long-awaited sequel promises emotional resonance and profound themes beneath its zany antics. Both loyal fans and newcomers are sure to be drawn into its resonant message about embracing oneâ€™s individuality.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
